title: Trusted Timestamp
description: Trusted Timestamp from authorized 3rd-party, or chain consensus

claimHash.description: calculate the hash from the entire list rather than from any single credential

hashKey.description: hashKey = hash(claimHash + timestamp) hashKey will be the key in the smart contract

signatureList.description: signed by Timestamp authority signature = sign( hashKey )

timestamp.description: trusted timestamp provided by the trusted third party or by the consensus of each node in the consortium chain
